function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Shift in diurnal activity patterns during lockdown","Impact":"Increased potential for overcrowding in outdoor spaces during peak hours, leading to higher risk of disease transmission.","Mitigation":"Encourage staggered use of outdoor recreational spaces to distribute activity more evenly throughout the day.","Technologies":"Crowd-monitoring and management systems for outdoor areas.","People":"General population using outdoor recreational spaces.","Owner":"Local government and city planners."},{"Description":"Less pronounced shift in weekday vs weekend activity during lockdown","Impact":"Potential for crowded outdoor spaces on weekends, leading to higher risk of disease transmission.","Mitigation":"Promote weekdays as prime time for outdoor recreation to reduce weekend crowding.","Technologies":"Public information campaigns and incentives to encourage weekday outdoor activities.","People":"General population using outdoor recreational spaces.","Owner":"Local government and city planners."},{"Description":"Rise in unemployment and flexible work schedules leading to changes in recreational behaviors","Impact":"Increased use of outdoor spaces for recreation during work hours, potentially leading to congestion and disease transmission.","Mitigation":"Encourage employers to implement policies that promote staggered work hours to avoid peak outdoor recreation times.","Technologies":"Workforce scheduling and coordination software.","People":"Employers and employees.","Owner":"Business owners and employers."}]}
